thread.section_title: Chewy.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Chewy.com | chewy.com | 2 of 320
thread.title: Tyra Jessey

author: Tyra Jessey
title: Tyra Jessey
text:
I ordered a couple of bones from Chewy.com. They broke within minutes of opening them. Today I was very disappointed and felt like I had thrown in the garbage can. I put the bottles in the trash and write a review about the bones on their website. A day or two later I received an email from Chewy .com, they had refunded the entire price of my purchase and apologize for the inconvenience and the disappointment.
That spoke volumes to me . they are a company that cares about sit customer satisfaction. That's very hard to find these days. I will definitely continue to do business with their company .
